Question
========

The quartile distance IQR is the area on the measurement scale

Answerlist
----------

* Within which the 50% middle observations are located.
* Within which the most observations belong.
* Above which 25% of the observations are located.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Within which are the 50% middle observations...: Correct
* Within which the most observations belong: Incorrect
* Above which 25% of the observations are located...: Incorrect
